page.title: 15EAST BOLDON CRICKET CLUB
page.content: {East Boldon Cricket Club}was opened in 1882. At present they have six teams: a first, second and third team, an under-18, under-15 and under-13 team. They use their new scoreboard which was built in 1983 after{Mr.Jack {Nicholson}donated Â£2500. The cricket season starts in April and finishes in September. Thje first team play in the{Durham Senior League. { }The Club hold several functions such as barbeques, comedy nights, raffles and bingo. One of the stars of the team is 19 year old{Gareth Smith,}a former pupil of{East Boldon Junior School.}Gareth has been offered a one year contract as a professional at Northamptonshire. He is a fast, left arm bowler.
